PSCT.Base: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Libromancer" card. If this card is Ritual Summoned by using a monster(s) on the field, it cannot be destroyed, or banished, by card effects. Gains 200 ATK/DEF each time your opponent activates a card or effect, while you control this card with ATK less than 3000 in the Monster Zone.
